pages.text: A new type of potion bottle can be created using spectral glass. This is useful for a variety of new potions that are listed on the next few pages.
The Spectral Glass Bottle cannot be inverted unlike actual spectral glass.

pages.title: Water
pages.text: The Spectral Potion of Water can be created by collecting up water by $(4)right-clicking$() and can be soul-infused into a Spectral Potion of Purifying.$(br2)You can also throw it to extinguish fires.

pages.title: Flame
pages.text: The Spectral Potion of Flame can be created by collecting fire by $(4)right-clicking$() and can be soul-infused into a Spectral Potion of Affliction.$(br2)You can also throw it to start fires and destroy cobwebs.

pages.title: Purifying
pages.text: The Spectral Potion of Purifying can be thrown to spawn a lingering cloud that dispels all negative effects.

pages.title: Affliction
pages.text: The Spectral Potion of Affliction can be thrown to spawn a lingering cloud that inflicts a random negative effect.
